chapters.title: Chapter 2: Questions of Leadership
chapters.info: Wil al'Seen, p. 62—Young man from Deven Ride, in the Two Rivers, who likes to flirt. He now is a leader among Perrin's Two Rivers recruits. He is among those who guard Perrin's tent from time to time. He is Perrin's distant cousin. He once planted a bucket of wet feathers so they would drop on Perrin.
